full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 86 of 236 990 LC3Cmax3 Alessi - cross 1 take her to different spas? 2 "A. Yes. 3 "Q. And there she would recruit young women to come to massage? 4 5 "A. Because she was English and she didn't know the area too much as well as I know. So she says, John, make a list of all 6 the massage, the spas in the area from Jupiter to Boca Raton, 7 and we went to all this main spas. And then we went to the 8 schools for massage therapists and all the massage parlors and 9 massages, the small massage. So I make a list from the 10 telephone book and we would go from one to the other one. I 11 would wait in the car and she goes in. And sometimes it took a 12 couple of minutes and walk out with cards, business cards, and 13 that she did the recruiting." 14 15 Do you see these questions and answers? 16 A. Yes, sir. 17 MS. COMEY: Your Honor, I would ask that the remainder 18 of the answer be read, please. 19 THE COURT: Go ahead. 20 "A. From then she would pick up the girls and that was the end 21 of it. I never did any recruiting and I never really saw him 22 doing that. Him, right?" 23 A. Hold on. Can you repeat the question. 24 Q. There is no question. I was just reading your answer, 25 Mr. Alessi. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012600
